hero.headline: Shopping is better <1>together.</1>
hero.subheadline: Stop buying the same milk twice. Mark[we]t syncs your lists in real-time, so everyone stays on the same page - even when offline.

features.heading: Everything you need
features.subheading: Mark[we]t is packed with features to make your shopping experience smooth and efficient.

realtime.title: Real-time Collaboration
realtime.desc: Share lists with family and friends. Changes appear instantly on everyone's device.

autosync.title: Auto Sync
autosync.desc: Never lose a list again. Your data is automatically synced across all your devices securely.

offline.title: Offline Mode
offline.desc: No internet? No problem. Add items offline and we'll sync them when you're back online.

multilanguage.title: Multi-language
multilanguage.desc: Available in multiple languages to suit your preferences and locale.

sounds.title: Interactive Sounds
sounds.desc: Satisfying sound effects when checking off items make shopping fun.

notifications.title: Smart Notifications
notifications.desc: Get notified when someone invites you to a list.

howItWorks.heading: How it Works
howItWorks.subheading: Simple coordination in four easy steps.

step1.title: 1. Create a List
step1.desc: Start by creating a new shopping list or to-do list in seconds.

step2.title: 2. Invite People
step2.desc: Send an invite link to your partner, roommate, or family member.

step3.title: 3. Collaborate
step3.desc: Add items and see changes appear instantly on everyone's screen.

step4.title: 4. Shop & Sync
step4.desc: Check off items as you shop. Everything stays perfectly in sync.

pricing.heading: Simple Pricing
pricing.subheading: Choose the specific plan that works for you.

t1.content: This tool has redefined our global collaboration. Simply essential for project success.

t2.content: Real-time synchronization allowed our teams across three continents to work as one.

t3.content: The best user experience I've seen in an app of this kind. World-class quality standard.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes! The free plan allows you to create only one list with a maximum of 3 guests.
faq.q2: Is it available on Android and iOS?
faq.a2: Not yet. The app is not available on the App Store or Google Play Store yet, but we are working on it!
faq.a3: Yes. You can add items offline, and they will sync to the cloud as soon as you reconnect.
faq.a4: We use industry-standard encryption to keep your lists private and secure. We never sell your personal data.
faq.q5: Can I share a list with someone who doesn't have the app?
faq.a5: They will need to download the app to collaborate in real-time, but invite links make onboarding instant.

footer.desc: Collaborative shopping lists reimagined for modern life.
footer.apkNote: Note: APK installation requires enabling unknown sources on your device.

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: How can we help you today?
help.gettingStartedDesc: Learn the basics of creating and sharing lists.
help.accountDesc: Manage your profile, language, and theme preferences.
help.troubleshootingDesc: Solutions to common issues and syncing problems.

invite-friends.title: How to invite friends to a list
content: Sharing lists on Mark[we]t is very simple. Follow the steps below:
1. Open the list you want to share.
3. Enter your friend's user code and click Add.

android-sync.title: Syncing issues on Android
android-sync.content: Your data should sync automatically. If you notice delays, check your internet connection and ensure power saving mode isn't restricting the app.

is-it-free.title: Is Mark[we]t free to use?
is-it-free.content: Yes! The basic plan is free. Check our Pricing page for more details on Premium plans.

delete-account.title: Delete my account
delete-account.content: We're sorry to see you go. To permanently delete your account, go to Settings > Account > Delete Account. This action cannot be undone.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: Welcome to Mark[we]t ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy notice, or our practices with regards to your personal information, please contact us.
privacy.collectText: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on the App, express an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and Services, when you participate in activities on the App or otherwise when you contact us.
privacy.personalDataText: Name, email address, password, profile picture.
privacy.usageDataText: Shopping lists, item details, completed tasks.
privacy.deviceDataText: IP address, device type, operating system.
privacy.useText: We use the information we collect or receive:
privacy.useList1: To facilitate account creation and logon process.
privacy.useList2: To send administrative information to you.
privacy.useList3: To fulfill and manage your orders.
privacy.sharingText: We only share information with your consent, to comply with laws, to provide you with services, to protect your rights, or to fulfill business obligations. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
